title: Animal hospitals, vet schools send ventilators to hospitals amid shortages

content:
Animal hospitals and veterinary schools are sending critically needed ventilators to hospitals facing supply shortages amid the coronavirus outbreak. 
Although the institutions use the equipment to treat animals, vets say the ventilators they use are the sam… [+2478 chars]
